articles.title: Local Gigs & Services: Roanoke's Creative Partner for Branding, Web, and Social Media Success
articles.author: Roanoke
articles.summary: Novum Creative, a Roanoke-based company, provides services like Custom Web Design & SEO, Brand Identity Development, Social Media Strategy & Management, Multimedia Marketing Campaigns, and Business Consulting & Growth Planning to help small businesses grow. The company leverages 14 years of digital marketing and sales experience to drive engagement, clicks, and conversions for their clients.

articles.title: Stressed About Turkey This Year? Here's How to Get Thanksgiving Dinner Delivered Straight to Your Door
articles.author: Sage Anderson
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing Thanksgiving meal delivery services in 2025. Hello Fresh offers a full Turkey Day feast or à la carte sides. Goldbelly features gourmet dishes from chefs and restaurants, while Gobble presents Classic and Deluxe Thanksgiving meal options. Purple Carrot specializes in plant-based Plantsgiving Box, and Omaha Steaks offers customizable Thanksgiving meals, along with Harry & David for a variety of feasts.

articles.title: Second Aldi location opens in Ocean Springs
articles.summary: Aldi has opened its second location in Ocean Springs. The opening attracted a large crowd.

articles.title: Starbucks Released Protein Coffee Drinks, So I Tried All Of Them — Here's My Honest Review As A Former Barista
articles.author: Dannica Ramirez
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced a new line of protein-infused coffee drinks on September 29, 2025, including the Protein Matcha Latte, Vanilla Protein Latte, Iced Banana Cream Protein Matcha, Chocolate Cream Protein Cold Brew, and Iced Vanilla Cream Protein Latte. The drinks incorporate whey protein isolate and are available in various flavors, with prices ranging from $6.25 to $6.75 for a tall size.

articles.title: Medialister Debuts AI-Powered 'Local Presence Booster' to Strengthen Brand Visibility in Local Search
articles.summary: Medialister has launched Local Presence Booster, an AI-based solution, to help local businesses improve visibility in local search results through editorial advertising. The Booster analyzes brand presence, identifies inconsistencies, and offers automated correction suggestions to improve local SEO.

articles.title: McDonald's chicken, value menus boost third-quarter sales
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: The company is currently testing a newly expanded beverage program across 500 stores. This indicates the potential launch or introduction of a new service offering.

articles.title: Popular Energy Drink Brand Launches New Flavor at 7-Eleven
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: An energy drink company is launching a new flavor. The company is using this new flavor to support a charitable cause through a limited-time promotion.

articles.title: Phunware Reports Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results
articles.summary: Phunware reported progress on launching its new AI Concierge and Guest Services Agent products, designed to enhance customer engagement and monetization in hospitality applications.  The company is running pilot programs for AI Concierge and developing the Guest Services Agent to provide restaurant information and booking. These AI-driven features aim to expand Phunware's product offerings and capitalize on emerging technologies.

articles.title: Mr. Pibb cherry soda is back in San Diego, with a new twist
articles.author: Roxana Popescu
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is reintroducing Mr. Pibb with a reformulated recipe and 30% more caffeine, targeting today's consumers. Einstein Bros. Bagels opened a new store in Chula Vista featuring a new Oktoberfest Egg Sandwich. Vispring Luxury Beds, a British mattress company, has opened its first store in San Diego County in La Jolla.

articles.title: Cook smarter, not harder: Ninja's 8.5-quart multitasker is 41% off
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Foodi PossibleCooker PRO, an 8.5-quart multi-cooker designed to replace 14 kitchen tools. The PossibleCooker PRO features triple fusion heat technology for faster cooking and includes an integrated heating element and is oven-safe up to 500 degrees.

articles.title: Candy Ignites the 11.11 Sales Excitement -- Making Smart, Affordable, and Reliable Home Living Possible for Every Filipino Family  Nov. 6, 2025 20:35
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, launched its first product in the Philippines, the Candy Dart Instant Water Heater, emphasizing accessibility and affordability. They're offering up to 79% off on the water heater during the 11.11 Sale and are seeking customer input for future product launches via a "Next Product Wish" campaign.

articles.title: Why a New Holiday Candle from Trader Joe's Has Shoppers Feeling Corn-flicted
articles.author: Elizabeth Fogarty
articles.summary: Trader Joe's launched a new product: the Can of Corn Scented Candle. The candle, designed to resemble a can of corn, features a soy wax blend with a sweet cornbread scent, designed to create a hospitable atmosphere. Shoppers online have expressed excitement and curiosity about the new product.

articles.title: Google Announces the Availability of Ironwood, Its Most Powerful Artificial Intelligence Chip to Compete with Nvidia
articles.author: Diario De Cádiz
articles.summary: Google Cloud announced its 7th generation "Ironwood" TPU and new Axion virtual machines based on Arm architecture. These introductions aim to provide a comprehensive infrastructure for AI development, showcasing new products and software improvements in its cloud ecosystem.

articles.title: Newark Downtown Welcomes Black Woman-Owned Floral Shop
articles.author: Salomé Prime
articles.summary: Sheaun Barnes has launched Madonna's Garden, a new floral shop in Newark. The shop sells various floral arrangements, jewelry, candles, and event planning services. Stoney Barnes helped Sheaun start the business, handling construction and deliveries.

articles.title: SHEGLAM Reinforces Commitment to High-Quality, Affordable, and Cruelty-Free Beauty
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: SHEGLAM, a beauty brand, focuses on innovation by using R&D, consumer feedback, and design creativity to create high-quality, affordable makeup. They collaborate with manufacturers, labs, and cultural icons such as Hello Kitty and Harry Potter to develop product collections that align with consumer needs and passions.

articles.title: Dry shampoo hailed 'best I've ever used' and shopper says they've 'tried them all'
articles.author: Jessica Brunt
articles.summary: Color Wow has launched the Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, featuring Active Cleansing Technology that removes up to 95% of sebum. The £26.50 formula uses a shampoo-grade cleanser and promises virtually no residue, distinguishing itself from competitors by cleaning like a proper shampoo with a floral fragrance.

articles.title: Nintendo has too many apps
articles.author: Ash Parrish
articles.summary: Nintendo has launched a new store app on Android and iOS. This app enables users to purchase hardware, accessories, and games for the Switch and Switch 2. The company aims to enhance user experience, even with the debate about app management.

articles.title: I've found the perfect first phone for kids
articles.author: Sarah Dawson
articles.summary: HMD has launched the HMD Fuse, a new smartphone designed for children with parental controls. The HMD Fuse features HarmBlock AI, which prevents children from filming or sending nudes and from seeing or saving explicit images. Parents can manage app access and phone usage through a dedicated parent app.

articles.title: A History of Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
articles.summary: First Page Sage announced the development of the first commercial Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) service on May 9, 2023, initially termed "Generative AI Optimization" (GAO) or "AI Optimization" (AIO). On March 19, 2024, First Page Sage launched its comprehensive GEO service, introducing strategic creation and distribution of list-based content and "authority statement PR."

articles.title: I Tried Dunkin's New 'Cookie Butter' Latte, and I'll Be Dreaming About This Cold Foam Forever
articles.author: Laney Crawley
articles.summary: Dunkin' has introduced the Cookie Butter Cloud Latte as a new addition to its holiday menu lineup on November 5th. The latte is made with espresso, cookie butter syrup, cookie butter cold foam, and cookie crumbles, and is available both iced and hot. Dunkin' describes the new latte as a mix of brown sugar, baked cookie flavor, and creamy sweetness.

articles.title: Zionova Launches New Website to Inspire Innovation Across Canada
articles.summary: Zionova launched its new website, www.zionova.is, designed to connect Canadians with the company's creative vision and services. The website offers a fresh look at Zionova's mission and provides easy access to information about the company's services.

articles.title: Innovation, Quality Drive Newton Golf's (NASDAQ: NWTG) Success
articles.summary: Newton Golf Company is solidifying its market position with precision-engineered gear, including the Fast Motion Driver Shaft and Gravity Putters, designed to enhance performance. The company combines advanced technology, ergonomic design, and high-quality materials to meet golfers' needs. Newton Golf harnesses physics to revolutionize golf equipment design.

articles.title: Stanley launches new Wellspring Bottle with push-button design
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Stanley has introduced the Wellspring Bottle, a new drinkware product designed for everyday hydration. This sleek, rectangular bottle features a push-button lid, sculpted drink spout, removable seal, and easy-carry loop.

articles.title: Taylor Swift-Inspired Sweaters and More Writer-Approved Amazon Finds
articles.author: Alyssa Grabinski
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced a new holiday storefront featuring various fashion and accessory items. These include the Amazon Essentials Relaxed-Fit Button-Collar Sweater, Anrabess Wide-Leg Pants Lounge Set, Dream Pairs Mini Ankle Boots, and a collaborative Amazon Essentials x Sofia Grainge Matching Holiday Family Pajama Set.

articles.title: Wawa in Staunton, VA, grand opening
articles.author: Patrick Hite
articles.summary: Wawa celebrated the grand opening of its new store located at 1031 Richmond Ave in Staunton.

articles.title: Mountain Dew is releasing a new flavor — and jokes that it'll ‘sell out in Utah immediately'
articles.author: Lottie Elizabeth Johnson
articles.summary: Mountain Dew is launching a new product called "Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda Dew" in early 2026, available nationwide in both full and zero sugar options. This new flavor mixes the 'citrus kick of Mountain Dew with a smooth cream flavor twist.' Early reviews suggest a mixed reception, with some finding the combination of flavors clashing.

articles.title: Here, try this: Angel's Tijuana Tacos' choice breakfast burrito
articles.author: Brock Keeling
articles.summary: Angel's Tijuana Tacos in Anaheim has introduced a new breakfast burrito featuring tender scrambled eggs, crispy tater tots, cheese, and a choice of bacon and chorizo. The burrito costs $12 and is characterized by its plump size and satisfying flavor profile. Angel's Tijuana Tacos initially began as a street stand operation known for its Tijuana style tacos.

articles.title: [REVIEW] I Really Like The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold But It Needs Some Improvements
articles.author: Sukhbir Cheema
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a foldable phone focusing on durability and usability, priced at RM7,999 for the 256GB model. The phone features an IP68 water- and dust-resistance rating, a solid hinge design, an 8-inch OLED main display, and a 5,015 mAh battery.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7: A work machine that comes alive at night...
articles.author: Neo Thale
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable device with an expansive inner display suited for multitasking. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features a 200MP camera and excellent Nightography. The phone has a good battery life lasting 28 hours.

articles.title: MainStreetChamber Holdings, Inc. Announces the National Launch of kathy ireland(R) Laundry's "Laundry Concierge" Program
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Advanced Licensing division is introducing the Laundry Concierge licensing program, a scalable pickup-and-delivery model for unattended and attended laundromats nationwide. This program aims to provide a technology-driven service model, combined with the kathy ireland® brand.

articles.title: Asda's £3.50 hack gave me so much more space in my small kitchen
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Asda sells a drying mat for £3.50 with dimensions L46.3 x W43.5 cm made of polyester, which adds extra space to put clean dishes. Additionally, the Dishmatic sponge, available at retailers like B&M for £1.75, features a fillable handle and replaceable sponge to make washing up easier.

articles.title: Landbase Named a Cool Vendor by Gartner®
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Landbase was recognized by Gartner as a Cool Vendor in AI for marketing for its agentic AI platform. The Landbase platform redefines how companies identify and engage their audiences. Recent platform advancements include enhanced natural-language querying, audience validation tools, and collaborative AI agents.

articles.title: Landbase Named a Cool Vendor by Gartner®
articles.summary: Landbase's agentic AI platform for go-to-market was recognized by Gartner. Recent advancements include enhanced natural-language querying, audience validation tools, and collaborative AI agents. Landbase's platform empowers businesses to scale lead generation efforts autonomously.

articles.title: In search of an easy morning routine, I tested 9 of the best hot brushes on my long bob
articles.author: Catherine Hufton
articles.summary: The article reviews several hot brushes, including the Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush, Babyliss Air Power Volume, Dyson Airwrap i.d, Remington Proluxe You Adaptive Hot Brush, Shark SmoothStyle Heated Brush & Smoothing Comb, GHD Rise Hot Brush, Revlon One Step Hair Dryer and Volumiser, BondiBoost Infrared Bounce Brush, and Amika Blowout Babe Thermal Brush. It details their features, such as suitability for wet or dry hair, temperature settings, and technology for reducing frizz and adding volume, providing consumers with information to make informed purchasing decisions.

articles.title: Why the smart ring I'm most fascinated about in 2025 isn't made by Oura - ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Sandbar is introducing the Stream Ring. Information on the Stream Ring's features and availability is provided.

articles.title: 'High-speed' ionic hairdryer that 'reduces fizz' now £24
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Debenhams has launched its early Black Friday sale, featuring the Extrastar NHY-607 1600W Ionic Hair Dryer. Shark has reduced the price of its SpeedStyle Pro 3-in-1 High-Velocity Hair Dryer System. Boots has also reduced the price of the REVAMP Enigma REVELATION Hair Dryer.

articles.title: Next fans go wild over 'super soft' knit skirt just €29
articles.summary: Next has launched a new Corduroy Mini Wrap Skirt, retailing at €29 and available in five colors. Marks & Spencer introduced a Metallic Spot Print Midi Waisted Dress for €65, featuring a black dress with gold spots and available in various sizes and lengths.

articles.title: 5 things to love about the new HONOR X7d 5G
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: HONOR has launched the HONOR X7d 5G smartphone in South Africa. The phone features a 6,500 mAh battery with 35W Supercharge, SGS Premium Drop Protection, IP65 Water Resistance and an Instant AI Button. The HONOR X7d 5G is available in Desert Gold and Velvet Black at a recommended retail price of R 3,999, along with a free three-month HONOR Care Screen Protection Gift.

articles.title: Google Is Helping WPP Build Websites That Show Up on All AI Search Engines
articles.author: Trishla Ostwal
articles.summary: Google is providing WPP-owned agencies with tools to improve brand visibility on AI search engines like Google's AI Overviews, ChatGPT and Perplexity. WPP is rolling out 'Generative Store', a new web experience designed to help brands appear in AI search results like ChatGPT by dynamically adapting websites and generating tailored experiences based on search queries.

articles.title: M&S shoppers can get 'beautiful' top perfect for parties for less than £8
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: TopCashback is offering new members a promotion on the M&S Sparkly Square Neck Top, reducing the price to under £10. The top, available in grape and gold, is designed for the festive season and is made from a blend of polyamide, metallised fibres, and elastane, offering a comfortable and versatile fit.

articles.title: Morphy Richards soup maker that's 'so easy to use' slashed by £25
articles.author: Eve Wagstaff
articles.summary: Morphy Richards has launched early Black Friday deals, featuring the Saute & Soup Maker, priced at £74.99. This appliance functions as both a pan and blender, offering settings for smooth or chunky soups, as well as juice and blend options. It has a 1.6-liter capacity and a countdown timer.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Shay Mitchell Bets Big on Kid-first Skin Care, Debuts Rini
articles.author: Kaleigh Werner
articles.summary: Shay Mitchell, along with Esther Song and Matte Babel, have launched Rini, a new skincare brand for children ages 4-12. The brand's initial product line includes the Hydrating Hydrogel Mask, the After Sun Hydrogel Mask, and the Everyday Face Sheet Mask, designed with natural, non-irritating ingredients for sensitive skin and available online. The masks range in price from $5.99 to $6.99.

articles.title: LivePerson Launches Conversation Simulator to De-risk Generative AI and Accelerate AI Adoption
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LivePerson has launched Conversation Simulator, a platform designed to test and analyze AI and human agents before real-world customer interactions. This platform helps brands validate GenAI models and accelerate AI onboarding, addressing the accuracy, compliance, and risk concerns associated with GenAI adoption.

articles.title: Lenskart opens AI-enabled smartglasses for Indian developers
articles.summary: Lenskart will launch AI-enabled smartglasses, B by Lenskart, by the end of December 2025, and will open it for India's developer community. The smartglasses are powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon AR1 Gen 1 chipset and equipped with Gemini 2.5 Live AI assistant, supporting features like hands-free UPI payments and live translation.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Voice Notes: Introducing AI-Powered Stream Ring for Instant Content Creation
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Sandbar has created Stream Ring, an innovative Smart Ring poised to redefine how individuals interact with technology. Sandbar positions Stream Ring as designed to be an extension of the user, offering a minimalistic interface for voice notes and direct interaction with an artificial intelligence chatbot. Sandbar will offer a free tier giving access to unlimited notes, but with restricted AI functionalities and Stream pro subscription is priced at $10 monthly.

articles.title: Meta Highlights Content Created via Meta AI Glasses in its Apps
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta has started highlighting Reels created via Meta Ray-Ban glasses within its apps through dedicated panels of videos. This promotion aims to showcase the product's video capture capacity and its various options, effectively advertising the AI glasses through user-generated content.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A's DLC drops this December
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.summary: Nintendo and The Pokémon Company will debut the Pokémon Legends: Z-A's Mega Dimension DLC on December 10th for the Switch and Switch 2. The expansion introduces trainer Ansha and her partner pokémon Hoopa, transporting players to Hyperspace Lumiose with new creatures like Mega Chimecho and Mega Baxcalibur.

articles.title: The AI-powered Stream Ring is designed for on-the-fly voice notes
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Sandbar, founded by former Meta employees, is launching its debut product, the Stream Ring, an AI-powered smart ring. The Stream Ring allows users to take voice notes and interact with a chatbot using a touch-activated microphone and is currently available for pre-order.

articles.title: Vertosoft Listed in AWS "ICMP" for the US Federal Government
articles.summary: Vertosoft listed its AI Launchpad ('VAIL') offering in the AWS Marketplace for the U.S. Intelligence Community (ICMP). Vertosoft's AI LaunchPad empowers government agencies to rapidly harness the power of artificial intelligence through an end-to-end platform that automates data prep, unifies data aggregation, simplifies model creation, and scales AI deployment with reliability and governance at its core.

articles.title: BrandSpark International and Newsweek Launch the First Annual Worth it! Awards - Recognizing Brands that Deliver Better Quality for a Fair Price
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BrandSpark International and Newsweek launched the inaugural BrandSpark® Worth it! Awards ™ program. The consumer-voted program will highlight brands Americans believe deliver better quality for a fair price. The awards recognize products and services valued by consumers.

articles.title: Spark Networks Launches Major Technology Platform Overhaul for EliteSingles, SilverSingles, Christian Mingle and Jdate
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Spark Networks launched comprehensive brand refreshes and a new unified technology platform across four of its flagship brands: EliteSingles, SilverSingles, Christian Mingle, and Jdate. This relaunch includes migration to a new technology platform, redesigned apps and user experience, and expanded premium offerings like premium matchmaking and dating coaching.

articles.title: iMini AI Launches E-Commerce Thematic Page: Redefining Full-Chain Content Production with Intelligent Technology
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: iMini AI has launched its E-Commerce Thematic Page featuring an all-in-one system with AI generation, smart editing, and video expansion capabilities. This integrated platform allows e-commerce creators to produce full-chain content, including main images, product details, and short videos, within a single workspace. The system is powered by models like Nano Banana, Google VEO 3.1, and Tongyi Wan 2.2, enabling features like automated image retouching, style switching, and text-to-video generation.

articles.title: Aurzen Debuts Aurzen Roku TV Smart Projector EAZZE D1R: Roku TV Projector with Dolby Audio
articles.author: Polk County Itemiser-Observer
articles.summary: Aurzen announced the launch of the Aurzen product on November 5, 2025, in Irvine, California.

articles.title: Candy Ignites the 11.11 Sales Excitement -- Making Smart, Affordable, and Reliable Home Living Possible for Every Filipino Family
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, launched its first product in the Philippines, the Candy Dart Instant Water Heater, designed to be accessible and affordable. For the 11.11 Sale, Candy is offering discounts up to 79% on the water heater, along with other promotions. The company is also gathering feedback for future product launches in the Philippines.

articles.title: Numeracle Expands Branded Calling Reach as Verizon Goes Live in the BCID Ecosystem
articles.summary: Numeracle Inc. announced that Verizon Wireless is live in the Branded Calling ID™ (BCID™) ecosystem, enabling the delivery of branded, verified enterprise calls to Verizon subscribers. The BCID service allows enterprises to securely display their verified name, logo, and call reason on millions of mobile devices across the United States, with both Verizon and T-Mobile wireless networks now supporting BCID as Authorized Terminating Service Providers (TSPs).

articles.title: Amazon's Best-Selling Fabric Shaver Is a Lifesaver During Sweater Season
articles.author: Rachel Weber
articles.summary: The Beautural Fabric Shaver and Lint Remover is highlighted as a solution for removing pilling and restoring fabric texture. It is powered by a high-speed motor with adjustable settings for various fabrics, and features a safety lock and a large lint collection container. User reviews praise its effectiveness on clothing and furniture, making them look new again.

articles.title: Moto G67 Power 5G With 50MP Camera And 7,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G67 Power in India with a starting price of Rs 15,999 for the base 8GB + 128GB model. The phone features a Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset, a 6.7-inch FHD+ display with 120Hz refresh rate, a 50MP main camera and a massive 7,000mAh battery with 30W charging.

articles.title: TECNO SPARK Slim and Megapad Pro Arrives with Style, Smarts, and Strength – Now Open for Pre-Order
articles.author: efosataiwo@vanguardngr.com
articles.summary: TECNO has introduced the SPARK Slim smartphone and the MEGAPAD SE/Pro, targeting young Nigerians and professionals/students respectively. The SPARK Slim boasts a slim design, advanced display, AI camera, and intelligent features, while the MEGAPAD offers productivity, creativity, and entertainment capabilities. Pre-orders are open in Nigeria from November 5 to 14, 2025, with incentives for early adopters, and the official launch is scheduled for November 15th.

articles.title: Making Smart, Affordable, and Reliable Home Living Possible for Every Filipino Family
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, has launched its first product in the Philippines, the Candy Dart Instant Water Heater. The brand offers a home essential that is accessible and affordable for every household. For the 11.11 Sale, Candy is offering up to 79% off on the Candy Dart Instant Water Heater.

articles.title: be!MYN: Redefining Gen Z Beauty with Versatility and Authenticity
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: be!MYN, a new Gen Z-centric beauty brand, has launched on Myntra Beauty with 27 SKUs. The brand offers premium, trend-driven, and long-lasting products suitable for Indian skin, focusing on affordability and quality. Myntra Jabong India Pvt. Ltd. facilitated the launch of be!MYN.

articles.title: Products are changing what we think ‘clean' smells like
articles.author: Washington Post
articles.summary: Laundry Sauce introduced Mojave peach detergent, marking their entry into fruity and fun fragrances. Hefty also launched birthday-cake-scented trash bags. These introductions reflect a trend towards gourmand scents in household products and cleaning supplies, driven by consumer demand for novel and comforting fragrances.

articles.title: Introducing be!MYN on Myntra, a GenZ-first beauty brand to encourage self-expression
articles.summary: Myntra has launched a new beauty brand called be!MYN, designed for Gen Z consumers and available on Myntra Beauty. The brand offers 27 SKUs of trendy and enduring products, including Matte Bullet Lipstick, Long-Stay Liquid Lipstick, High-shine Gloss, and All-day Kajal, all formulated for Indian skin tones and conditions.

articles.title: Nubia Z80 Ultra review: I'm a big fan of this left-field flagship's unusual camera setup
articles.summary: Nubia has launched the Z80 Ultra, a new flagship smartphone featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 7200mAh battery with 80W charging, and a unique 35mm main camera lens. The Z80 Ultra aims to offer top-tier performance and features at a competitive price.

articles.title: Scaling B2B SaaS Revenue With Generative AI
articles.author: Oubai Al Hendi
articles.summary: SaaS companies are increasingly adopting agentic AI to automate and enhance various business functions, including demand generation, customer onboarding, and pricing. This involves using AI agents to execute tasks autonomously, personalize customer interactions, and optimize processes across the customer lifecycle. The shift aims to enable SDRs to focus on closing deals while AI handles repetitive tasks, ultimately leading to increased efficiency and revenue growth.

articles.title: Revolutionizing Retail: Netcore Cloud's Enrichment for AI Shopping
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Netcore Cloud launched 'Enrichment for Agentic Commerce', a new platform that makes product catalogs AI-discoverable across platforms like ChatGPT and Google Gemini. The platform provides essential metadata, enabling AI to index and recommend products. This AI-driven enrichment aims to provide brands with a competitive advantage in digital retail.

articles.title: Johnson's Baby unveils new brand identity, upgraded formulations, and sustainable packaging with ‘It's Pure Love' campaign
articles.summary: Johnson's Baby has relaunched its product range with upgraded, skin-science-based formulations, refreshed branding, and sustainable packaging made with 50% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastic. The new moisturizing range delivers up to 72 hours of moisturization, while Johnson's Baby Soap now provides triple protection against germs, dryness, and irritation. This launch is supported by a new campaign, 'It's Pure Love,' featuring Anil Kapoor and Sonam Kapoor.

articles.title: Mattressman opening new shop in Thetford amid expansion
articles.author: Hallie Taylor
articles.summary: Mattressman is launching a new store in Thetford as part of a company expansion plan. The company's mascot is also making a comeback on social media and will visit stores for the Black Friday sale. Two additional stores are slated to open in London early next year.

articles.title: Datei:Voyah Courage Auto Zurich 2025 DSC 3018.jpg – Wikipedia
articles.summary: Voyah debuted its Courage model at Auto Zurich 2025, showcasing a luxury electric vehicle designed to disrupt the EV market.  The Courage features a sleek, modern design prioritizing aesthetics, aerodynamic efficiency, and a premium interior experience. The unveiling underscores the increasing competition and innovation within the electric vehicle sector.

articles.title: Honda announces electric motorcycle business Brand Promise
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Honda has introduced a new brand promise, 'Expected life. Unexpected discoveries,' and four core values for its electric motorcycle business. They also unveiled the Honda WN7 model at EICMA 2025, showcasing their new visual identity for electric motorcycles, using 'Honda' as the product mark. Honda aims to achieve carbon neutrality across all motorcycle products by the 2040s, with electrification at the forefront.

articles.title: NCT launches maiden RM1bil sukuk wakalah with Maybank as key investor
articles.author: Asila Jalil
articles.summary: NCT Group has launched its maiden RM1 billion sukuk wakalah programme with Maybank participating in the first tranche. The company also held a groundbreaking ceremony for Phase 2 of its flagship NCT Smart Industrial Park (NSIP) in Selangor, aiming to enhance funding flexibility and drive industrial transformation.

articles.title: MainStreetChamber Holdings, Inc. Announces the National Launch of kathy ireland(R) Laundry's "Laundry Concierge" Program
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Advanced Licensing division introduces a scalable pickup-and-delivery model. This model is designed for unattended and attended laundromats nationwide. It opens licensing opportunities for individuals aiming to start or expand pickup-and-delivery laundry businesses.

articles.title: MainStreetChamber Holdings, Inc. Announces the National Launch of kathy ireland(R) Laundry's "Laundry Concierge" Program
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: kathy ireland® Laundry, a division of Advanced Licensing, launched its Laundry Concierge licensing program nationwide on November 6, 2025. This program is an on-demand pickup, wash-dry-fold, and delivery service model. It utilizes unattended laundromats during off-peak hours and supports attended laundromats.

articles.title: MarketFully strengthens global position in InContent Marketing with further brand consolidation and launch of MarketFully.AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: MarketFully announced a brand consolidation, introducing MarketFully.AI as its new multilingual content marketing platform. Key Content and MotionPoint will operate as InContent Marketing Agencies under MarketFully. MarketFully.AI unifies adaptive translation, transcreation, and content creation, combining AI-powered technology with human expertise.

articles.title: This Black-owned clean makeup startup bootstrapped its way to being a $10 million brand
articles.author: Elizabeth Segran
articles.summary: LYS, a clean cosmetics brand founded by Tisha Thompson, launched in 2021 and quickly achieved over $10 million in sales. The brand was introduced directly into Sephora with a relatively small initial investment, demonstrating success as a Black-owned beauty company.

articles.title: SwitchBot S20 review – powerful 10kPa robot vacuum with AI cleaning
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: SwitchBot launched the S20, a new robot vacuum with features like 10kPa suction, dToF LiDAR, AI camera for obstacle avoidance, and advanced carpet detection, costing £799.99 but available for £499.99 with a voucher. The S20 exerts 1KG of pressure on its cylindrical mop roller, includes a built-in wiper, and offers cleaning power comparable to vacuums costing twice as much.

articles.title: SwitchBot S20 review: the smart robot vacuum that's a total steal
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the S20, a new robot vacuum with 10kPa suction, dToF LiDAR, AI camera for obstacle avoidance, and advanced carpet detection, priced at £799.99 or £499.99 with a voucher. The S20 exerts 1KG of pressure on its mop roller, includes a wiper for moisture removal, and offers cleaning power comparable to vacuums costing twice as much.

articles.title: Ginny and Georgia season 4 gets major update to 'stir things up'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Netflix has unveiled news regarding the new season of 'Ginny & Georgia'. This indicates the launch or update of entertainment content on the Netflix platform.

articles.title: Does your washing machine really need AI or are you just buying a buzzword?
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: LG advertises its 'AI Direct Drive' which detects fabric type and load weight, then tweaks the wash motion for each cycle. Samsung's Bespoke AI range includes automatic detergent dosing, personalized cycle recommendations, and Wi-Fi integration. IFB and Bosch washing machines include load-sensing, water softening, and cycles that 'learn' from family habits.

articles.title: 37 Personal Care Products You'll Be Excited To Use
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: Cosrx launched a two-pack of snail mucin essence with a bonus retinol cream. I Dew Care launched a benzene-free dry shampoo powder. Megababe launched an anti-chafing balm formulated with moisturizing ingredients. Eos launched a body lotion enhanced with shea oil and butter. Revlon launched a volcanic stone face roller. Peach Slices launched overnight hydrocolloid nose patches. CeraVe launched a deeply hydrating night cream with ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. Anua launched a heartleaf extract cleansing oil. Lumify launched eye drops to reduce redness. Neutrogena launched a fragrance-free shampoo formulated with salicylic acid. YogaToes launched gem-shaped toe stretchers.

articles.title: Here's How Maoni Is Making It Easier to Find Places You Can Trust
articles.summary: Maoni, a Nigerian-built review app, has launched to offer authentic reviews for businesses. The app utilizes a 'Give-to-Earn' model, rewarding users for sharing genuine feedback with vouchers and products. The app also helps spotlight small businesses getting strong authentic reviews, giving them visibility without the need for influencer marketing.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 India launch next week: 5 upgrades you must know
articles.summary: OnePlus has officially announced the launch of the OnePlus 15 in India, expected in mid-November with a design refresh and significant hardware upgrades. The OnePlus 15 features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, a triple 50-megapixel rear camera system, and a 7,300mAh battery.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy M17 5G in Nepal with 'No Shake Camera'
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal has launched the Galaxy M17 5G smartphone, featuring an Optical Image Stabilization camera (OIS) and AI-powered features. The phone is equipped with an Exynos 1330 processor and a 6.7-inch FHD+ Super AMOLED display, with pricing starting at NPR 25,999. Samsung has also partnered with HFL to provide financing options.

articles.title: Meet Stream Ring, the AI gadget that records your thoughts and talks back in your own voice
articles.summary: Sandbar is launching the Stream Ring, an AI-powered wearable ring that records and transcribes voice via a connected smartphone app. The ring is available for preorder in the US, with a starting price of $249, and Sandbar expects to begin shipping it in summer 2026.

articles.title: Grab The Deals On Singles' Day
articles.author: Iris
articles.summary: Moose Knuckles is offering $100 off purchases of $1,000 or more from November 5-13. Lancôme is celebrating Singles' Day with 25% off full-size skincare and up to 50% off skincare bundles from November 3-12, 2025. Shu Uemura is providing 25% off bestsellers in makeup and skincare, while BABOR has a Buy One, Get One Free offer on all Ampoules and the Hydro Filler Routine from November 6-11. Saje provides 11% off 11 selected SKUs for 24 hours. Lenovo's 11.11 Singles' Day Sale features discounts on laptops, desktops, and gaming gear. Best Buy's 48-hour Singles' Day Sale begins November 10, 2025, with deals across tech and electronics.

articles.title: IRON: Xpeng's humanoid robot uses solid-state battery for long life
articles.author: Sujita Sinha
articles.summary: Xpeng introduced its second-generation IRON humanoid robot at the 2025 AI Day in Guangzhou. This new version boasts upgrades in movement, control, and balance, enabling it to interact with people in real-time and perform daily tasks. IRON's lifelike motion is achieved through AI training on human walking footage, and it is powered by three Turing AI chips.

articles.title: Lenskart Prepping To Launch AI Smart Glasses In India Next Month, All You Need To Know
articles.summary: Lenskart is preparing to launch its first AI-powered smart glasses, B by Lenskart Smartglasses, by the end of December. These smart glasses will include AI features like live translation, hands-free UPI payments, and are powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon AR1 Gen 1 processor. The glasses will compete with Meta smart glasses in the Indian market after Lenskart's stock listing on November 10, 2025.

articles.title: After Being Diagnosed with a Condition That Causes Muscle Weakness, She Created an Accessible Makeup Solution (Exclusive)
articles.author: Madison E. Goldberg
articles.summary: Glam Pod founder Alicia Angel is developing the Glam Mask, a makeup mask designed to apply a full face of makeup in seconds. The mask is currently in development and beta testing, with a planned launch in 2026. It will come preloaded with customizable makeup looks via an app, using skin-safe ingredients, and a subscription plan is planned for purchasing.

articles.title: Top 10 7 kg washing machines under  ₹20,000 for smart laundry in 2025
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article highlights several new or updated 7kg washing machine models for 2025 from various companies like Whirlpool, Samsung, IFB, Godrej, LG, and Voltas Beko. These models include both fully automatic and semi-automatic options, featuring advancements such as inverter motors, eco bubble technology, AI-powered systems, and specialized drum designs for improved wash quality and efficiency. The article emphasizes features like energy efficiency, smart cleaning technologies, and durable designs among the various washing machine models.

articles.title: Top 10 7 kg washing machines under ₹20,000 for smart laundry in 2025
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article presents a comparison of washing machines from various companies, highlighting models from Whirlpool, Samsung, IFB, Godrej, LG, and Voltas Beko. These models feature technologies like Eco Bubble, AI Deep Clean, Smart Inverter, and Tidal Wash, offering various features and specifications for different needs and budgets. The article provides information related to performance, durability, and value of the washing machine.

articles.title: Netcore Unbxd Launches 'Enrichment for Agentic Commerce' to Make Retailers Visible in the Age of AI Shopping
articles.author: Netcore Cloud
articles.summary: Netcore Cloud launched Enrichment for Agentic Commerce, a new AI-powered platform for retailers. This platform structures and enriches product catalogues, enabling discovery across AI shopping agents like ChatGPT and Gemini.

articles.title: Motorola's super-slim new phone costs half the price of an iPhone - with just as much power
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Motorola has introduced the Moto Edge 70, a new super slim smartphone measuring 5.99mm thick, featuring a 6.67-inch screen, Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor, fast-charging battery, AI-powered triple-lens camera with 4K video recording, and a durable design with aircraft-grade aluminum and Gorilla Glass. Priced at £699.99, it's available for purchase now and is more affordable than the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge and Apple iPhone Air.

articles.title: GCash launches 2 game-changing solutions for MSMEs, freelancers
articles.author: The Philippine Star
articles.summary: GCash launched two new products: GCash PocketPay, aimed at providing solutions for merchants, and GCash services.

articles.title: IIIF150 Action 15 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: IIIF150 has announced the Action 15 smartphone in Q4 2025, featuring a 6.67-inch display, MediaTek Helio G81 processor, 6GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 48MP dual-camera setup. The phone runs on Android 15 and is powered by a 5100 mAh battery.

articles.title: JDO refines Jameson's brand and packaging
articles.author: Ritupriya Basu
articles.summary: Jameson Irish Whiskey has launched a redesign of its branding and packaging, handled by JDO. The redesign aims to modernize the brand while maintaining its iconic elements and creating visual harmony across the entire Jameson whiskey portfolio. Updates include the 'Proud Bottle' for the Original whiskey, elevated bottle shoulder, and expanded slip labels for the Reserve Series to enhance storytelling.

articles.title: Dusting powders are the body care secret to staying fresh all day
articles.author: Aaliyah Harry
articles.summary: Lush has launched new dusting powder products, Fairy Dust and Sticky Dates. Estee Lauder offers Beautiful Perfumed Body Powder, while Yardley London features Perfumed Body Powder - English Rose. Lush's Fairy Dust dusting powder includes the nostalgic Snow Fairy scent.

articles.title: DDPAI Launches the Z90 Series in Riyadh: 'Born to Lead' Defines a New Standard in Smart Dashcams
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: DDPAI launched its flagship Z90 Series and showcased the new N5 Pro at an event in Riyadh. The event, themed 'Born to Lead,' was attended by distributors, media, and industry partners.

articles.title: Leonardo.Ai launches Blueprints to simplify professional-grade AI creation
articles.author: Natasha Lee
articles.summary: Leonardo.Ai has launched Blueprints, a new suite of pre-built generative AI workflows. These workflows aim to streamline creative processes and deliver high-quality outputs quickly. The initial line-up includes Instant Brand Kit, Product Lifestyle Photoshoot and Instant Animate, all designed to help creators accelerate campaigns and maintain brand consistency.

articles.title: IFF Benicarló Pioneers On-Site Green Hydrogen Production Facility for Sustainable Fragrance Ingredient Manufacturing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF, in partnership with Iberdrola, has launched a nature-based hydrogen production facility at its Benicarló, Spain plant, utilizing renewable electricity for fragrance ingredient manufacturing. IFF also unveiled ENVIROCAP™, a biodegradable scent delivery system for fabric care, and announced a partnership with Reservas Votorantim for sustainable bioprospecting.

articles.title: Meet NEO: The Humanoid That Learns While It Cleans
articles.author: i HLS News Desk
articles.summary: Robotics firm 1X introduced NEO, a consumer-ready humanoid robot, designed to assist with household chores. NEO features a 'chores' system, advanced AI, including an LLM for natural conversation, object recognition, and learning capabilities. It blends flexible hardware, adaptive AI, and task-focused programming for practical, everyday applications in domestic life.

articles.title: Netcore Cloud Pioneers Shift with Outcome-Based Pricing in Martech
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Netcore Cloud has launched a Variable Pricing Model for its Agentic Marketing Platform, linking marketing technology costs to business results. This outcome-based model ties payments to measurable impacts like engagement or revenue increases. The announcement was made at Agentic Marketing 2025.

articles.title: Moto G57 and Moto G57 Power with Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 SoC launched: Price, features and more
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G57 and Moto G57 Power globally, both powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 4. The Moto G57 Power, priced at EUR 279, has a 7,000mAh battery, while the Moto G57, priced at EUR 249, comes with a 5,200mAh battery and is available in the Middle East.

articles.title: Ultra Salts At Durity Distribution: The Vaper's Choice For Smooth Hits
articles.author: Editor In Chief
articles.summary: Durity Distribution introduced "Ultra Salts," a vaping product known for smooth hits, vibrant flavors, and consistent quality. It offers a range of nicotine strengths and is designed for both new and experienced vapers. Retailers can benefit from bulk ordering options, ensuring a steady supply.

articles.title: From search to serendipity: Why the new CPG playbook needs connection architects and pulse planners
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 06
articles.summary: Goli Nutrition leveraged TikTok, employing micro-creators to drive sales of their nutrition supplement gummies, achieving top-selling status and substantial revenue. Similarly, Bakmi Mewah used authentic creator videos to generate millions of views, while Somethinc and Blu by BCA created engaging content to introduce skincare science and banking services. Kelaya Hair Treatment disrupted traditional retail with a 24-hour live-shopping marathon, demonstrating how platforms like TikTok are pivotal for product launches and driving immediate sales.

articles.title: 34 Super Impressive Beauty Products Under $15
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: L'Oreal introduces moisturizing purple shampoo and anti-redness BB cream. Nivea launches a vitamin C-enriched skin-firming lotion. Maybelline presents a buildable mascara with a spiral-shaped brush. E.l.f. Cosmetics offers a lash-extending tubing mascara. Clinique offers lightweight tinted lip balms. Revlon offers setting spray containing a superfood blend of citrus, aloe, and broccoli. John Frieda is launching hair-lightening spray formulated.

articles.title: Angel Yeast's Production Line Revolutionizes Sustainable Protein Industry
articles.author: Yichang
articles.summary: Angel Yeast Co., Ltd. has inaugurated a new yeast protein production facility in Yichang, Hubei, with an annual production capacity of 11,000 tons. The facility will produce AngeoPro, a sustainable protein product recognized for its purity and taste.

articles.title: Swipe Slay Shine Lipsticks You'll Love on Myntra
articles.summary: Revlon is introducing Super Lustrous Lipstick Blushing Nude, promising smooth and radiant everyday elegance. L'Oréal Paris launches Color Riche Satin Lipstick, providing rich, smudge-proof color. Maybelline New York presents Color Creamy Matte Lipstick Rich Ruby for a bold, velvety look. Lakme introduces 9to5 Powerplay Priming Matte Lipstick with Vitamin E care for 16-hour perfection, and Pilgrim launches Matte Colour Transferproof Lipstick with intense pigment and all-day stay.

articles.title: Celebrating 25 years of Ahmed Al Maghribi Perfumes
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: ahmedalmaghribiperfumes is introducing a new product line called "K-Series."

articles.title: Constructor Showcases AI Product Insights Agent (PIA)
articles.summary: Constructor has launched its AI Product Insights Agent (PIA), a virtual product expert for e-commerce product detail pages. PIA uses generative AI and e-commerce data to answer shopper questions and provide natural language experiences, helping shoppers make informed purchase decisions. The agent integrates with Constructor's recommendations engine to offer personalized lists of complementary or alternative items.

articles.title: Gaioza Launches the World's First Free SEO 2.0 Platform, Introducing AI-Powered 'High-Performing Search Phrases' Technology
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Gaioza launched a free AI-driven SEO 2.0 platform powered by GAIO. The platform aims to transform online visibility for creators, marketers, and brands through intelligent search optimization.

articles.title: Best early Black Friday Verizon deals 2025: 10+ deals for new and existing users
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Big Red, likely Verizon, is offering early Black Friday deals. These deals include new phones and tablets available for less than retail price.

articles.title: From powder to plastic-free: The rise of eco-friendly detergents in the UAE
articles.author: Nida Sohail
articles.summary: Baya launched its laundry detergent sheets in 2023, offering a plastic-free and non-toxic alternative to traditional cleaning products. The company has since expanded its portfolio to include biodegradable dryer sheets and reusable color catchers, focusing on a direct-to-consumer subscription model. These developments highlight Baya's commitment to providing innovative and sustainable home cleaning solutions.

articles.title: NCS Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Singapore Company of the Year Recognition in the Managed IT Services Industry
articles.author: Star Local
articles.summary: NCS is driving digital transformation in Singapore by offering comprehensive managed IT services and innovation to enhance customer value and resilience.

articles.title: 33 Practical Products That'll Also Help You Check Your "Little Treat" Box For The Week
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Monday Haircare is launching a Dry Shampoo with gardenia scent and keratin treatment. Eos introduces a 24H Moisture Super Balm in marshmallow fluff flavor. Hawaiian Tropic releases an SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush for scalp protection.

articles.title: MediaBoost Launches Fast-Track Media Exposure Platform for Startups Seeking AI-Indexed Credibility
articles.summary: Mediaboost, a PR technology platform designed for startups and SMEs, launched to simplify brand visibility across online publications. The platform offers automated submission and editorial review to make media visibility faster and affordable. Mediaboost aims to make professional-grade public relations accessible to any business.

articles.title: Monstarlab Launches 'MonstarX,' a Multi-AI Agent Platform for Enterprise Prototyping
articles.summary: Monstarlab Inc. has launched MonstarX, a Multi-AI Agent Platform for Enterprise Prototyping. MonstarX is a SaaS-based platform that allows users to create prototypes through natural language interaction, without needing coding skills. The platform offers various features including rapid prototyping, enterprise-ready security, and seamless transition to production, with pricing starting at $20 per month.

articles.title: Primo+Skin champions the morena glow with Science-backed skincare for Filipinas
articles.author: INQUIRER.net
articles.summary: Primo+Skin, a skincare brand, has launched its Hydro Glow line tailored for Filipina skin. The product line includes Hydro Glow Facial Wash, Toner, Moisturizer, Sunscreen, Body Lotion, and Whitening Soap, all formulated with ingredients like Niacinamide and Hyaluronic Acid to hydrate and improve skin tone.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics adds Dark Steel and Black Caviar colors to Bespoke AI Combo
articles.author: Chun Byung-Soo
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching two new colors, 'Dark Steel' and 'Black Caviar,' for its 'Bespoke AI Combo' all-in-one washer-dryer, expanding consumer options. The new models retain existing AI features like 'AI Customized Cycle' and 'AI Auto Detergent Dispensing'. The 'Bespoke AI Combo' ships at 3.149 million won, and the colors are available through Samsung's website and various retailers.

articles.title: Plexus sets up compliance platform ‘Marketing Wizard'
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Plexus has launched Marketing Wizard, an AI-powered compliance platform designed for marketing and legal teams. The platform uses AI to automate compliance checks, referencing over 230 laws and company-specific guidelines to accelerate content approval and reduce legal review times. Early adopters have seen campaign launch speeds increase up to five times faster.

articles.title: India clicks on Ulaa, Arattai
articles.author: Tejal Sinha
articles.summary: Zoho created Ulaa, a new browser, to improve privacy and security for business users. The browser is designed to integrate with Zoho's existing suite of business applications, offering an alternative to general-purpose browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Brave by focusing on organizational needs and enhanced privacy features.

articles.title: Charlotte Tilbury launches first-ever mystery bag with full-sized 'instant radiance' �16 Magic Cream
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: The cream provides a user with a clean and younger-feeling skin. The user considers it the best product ever after using at nearly 60 years old.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 to launch November 13 globally: 50MP camera, 6.78-inch display and other features to expect
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, on November 13 at 7 PM globally. OnePlus positions the OnePlus 15 as its most powerful and durable smartphone, promising exceptional speed.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A Confirms Mega Dimension DLC Release Date, New Mega Evolution
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's new Mega Dimension DLC trailer reveals the release date and new Mega Evolutions are coming to the game. This represents an update and the introduction of new features for the game.

articles.title: Pok�mon Legends Z-A Shine Bright like a Gemstone walkthrough
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Pokémon Legends: Z-A launched its first Extra Side Mission, named 'Shine Bright like a Gemstone.'

articles.title: Quali's Torque Platform Scales NVIDIA DGX Spark for Secure, Orchestrated AI at the Edge
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Quali integrates its Torque platform with NVIDIA DGX Spark. This integration delivers secure, autonomous AI at the edge for industries like retail, defense, and healthcare.

articles.title: Launch your e-commerce site today with SimplyBLU Online Store Builder
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Standard Bank introduced a free platform designed to enable its merchants to easily enter the digital marketplace.

articles.title: Local Company Innovates with New Solar-powered Widget
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: The company launched a new solar-powered widget. The widget targets eco-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Dry shampoo hailed 'best I've ever used' and shopper says they've 'tried them all'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Color Wow's Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo utilizes Active Cleansing Technology. This technology removes up to 95% of sebum in a single application, cleaning hair like a real shampoo.

articles.title: Teads Appoints Mollie Spilman as Chief Commercial Officer
articles.author: Caledonian Record
articles.summary: Teads, an omnichannel outcomes platform, is mentioned. Teads appears to be a company that offers some kind of platform service.

articles.title: What Crypto to Buy Now? Analysts Are Pointing to the Noomez ($NNZ) Presale
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Noomez ($NNZ), a new cryptocurrency project, launched recently and is attracting attention from crypto analysts. The project's structure is designed as a community-driven tokenomics experiment.

articles.title: How to Start Shine Bright like a Gemstone in Pokemon Legends Z-A and Catch Diancie
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends Z-A introduced a Mystery Gift feature. This new feature allows online-connected trainers to claim a Mega Stone.

articles.title: Former North Charleston Denny's site to sling sliders from a shipping container
articles.author: Provided/Smalls Sliders
articles.summary: Smalls Sliders, an Atlanta-based franchise, is set to open a new restaurant location in North Charleston in mid-January, featuring a unique modular design. Ethos Athletic Club is also opening a new two-story workout location in Mount Pleasant, expected to open in late 2026 and featuring various amenities.

articles.title: Retail AI Transformation: Miklos Roth's 20-Minute Prescription for Omni-Channel Success
articles.author: Bence berendezések
articles.summary: The article introduces Miklos Roth's "20-Minute Prescription" (HVHI model), a framework designed to help retailers rapidly improve their omni-channel experience. This model focuses on a 6-week sprint to unify data and integrate systems using a lightweight "API wrapper," enabling the deployment of AI-powered solutions like intelligent order orchestration and personalized customer experiences, by wrapping your legacy-silos and fire-walling an "Omni-Channel Pod."

articles.title: ‘Fresh Food With Attitude': New Fish and Chicken Restaurant Opens in Derry, New Hampshire
articles.author: Sean McKenna
articles.summary: Fish & Chix, a new fish and chicken restaurant, opened on November 2 in Derry, New Hampshire, offering a menu centered on crispy chicken and fish, along with other seafood options like shrimp, clam strips, and lobster rolls. Early reviews have been positive, praising the fresh and tasty food and excellent prices.
